UncommonMagicItems.Name: Adamantine Armor
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This suit of armor is reinforced with adamantine, granting it exceptional durability and resistance to damage.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Alchemy Jug
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This magical jug can produce various substances, including fresh water, beer, mayonnaise, and more.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: All-Purpose Tool
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This versatile tool can transform into various forms, such as a crowbar, a shovel, or a pickaxe, based on the wielder's needs.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Ammunition, +1, +2, or +3
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These magical projectiles grant a bonus to attack and damage rolls when used as ammunition for ranged weapons.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Amulet of Proof Against Detection and Location
UncommonMagicItems.Description: While wearing this amulet, you cannot be targeted by divination spells and cannot be detected through magical means.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Amulet of the Devout
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This amulet grants its wearer bonuses to spell saves and can restore spell slots when prayers are offered.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Amulet of the Drunkard
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This amulet absorbs the effects of alcohol, allowing the wearer to drink heavily without becoming intoxicated.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Arcane Grimoire
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This enchanted book provides additional spellcasting abilities to those who attune to it.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Bag of Holding
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This magical bag has an extradimensional interior, providing ample storage space for items.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Bag of Tricks
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This bag can produce various small animals on command, which can be used to aid the owner.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Balance of Harmony
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This balance beam provides advantage on Acrobatics and Athletics checks for maintaining balance.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Balloon Pack
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This backpack can inflate into a balloon, allowing the wearer to float for short periods.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Barrier Tattoo
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This magical tattoo creates protective barriers that can absorb damage for the wearer.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Blood Spear
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This weapon is bound to the wielder's blood, granting bonuses to attack and damage rolls.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Bloodwell Vial
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This vial can store the blood of creatures and be used for various purposes, including healing and spellcasting.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Boots of Elvenkind
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These boots grant advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and make the wearer's footsteps nearly silent.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Boots of Striding and Springing
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These boots enhance the wearer's mobility, allowing for increased speed and jumping capabilities.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Boots of the Winterlands
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These boots provide resistance to cold damage and allow the wearer to move across icy terrain with ease.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Bottled Breath
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This potion allows the drinker to breathe underwater for a limited time.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Bracers of Archery
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These bracers grant bonuses to attack rolls with ranged weapons and increase the range of ranged attacks.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Brooch of Living Essence
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This brooch can store the essence of slain creatures and release it to heal the wearer.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Brooch of Shielding
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This brooch provides protection against magic missile spells and other forms of magical attacks.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Broom of Flying
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This enchanted broomstick allows the user to fly through the air at a controlled speed.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Cap of Water Breathing
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This cap allows the wearer to breathe underwater as if they were on land.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Circlet of Blasting
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This circlet can release powerful blasts of energy, dealing damage to targets.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Cloak of Elvenkind
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This cloak grants advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and makes the wearer blend into natural surroundings.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Cloak of Protection
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This cloak grants a bonus to AC and saving throws while worn.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Cloak of the Manta Ray
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This cloak allows the wearer to breathe underwater and swim with great speed.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Coiling Grasp Tattoo
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This magical tattoo enhances the wearer's ability to grapple and restrain foes.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Cracked Driftglobe
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This partially damaged driftglobe can emit light and levitate, but has limited functionality.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Cursed Luckstone
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This luckstone carries a curse that grants both good and bad luck to the bearer.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Decanter of Endless Water
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This decanter can produce an endless stream of water, making it useful for various purposes.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Deck of Illusions
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This deck of cards can create illusory images and creatures when cards are drawn.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Dragon Vessel
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This vessel can store and release a dragon's breath weapon, allowing the user to unleash devastating attacks.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Dragonhide Belt
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This belt is made from dragon scales and provides resistance to a specific type of damage.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Dragon's Wrath Weapon
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This weapon is imbued with the fury of dragons, dealing additional damage and effects against dragon-type creatures.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Dragon-Touched Focus
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This focus is crafted from dragon parts and enhances the user's spellcasting abilities.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Driftglobe
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This magical globe emits light and can levitate, serving as a versatile source of illumination.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Dust of Corrosion
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This powder corrodes metal objects upon contact, causing them to degrade or break.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Dust of Deliciousness
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This dust can be sprinkled on food to enhance its flavor and nutrition.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Dust of Disappearance
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This fine powder can turn the user invisible for a limited duration when thrown into the air.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Dust of Dryness
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This dust can absorb large quantities of water, turning it into a small pellet for later use.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Dust of Sneezing and Choking
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This dust, when released, can cause creatures to suffer from sneezing fits or choking, potentially incapacitating them.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Earworm
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This magical earworm provides its user with knowledge of a specific topic or skill.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Eldritch Claw Tattoo
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This tattoo enhances the user's unarmed strikes, granting additional damage and effects.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Elemental Gem
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This gem can summon an elemental creature to aid the user, based on the gem's type.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Emerald Pen
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This enchanted pen can write messages in an unknown script that can only be read with another emerald pen.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Eversmoking Bottle
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This bottle continually emits thick smoke, obscuring vision and providing concealment.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Eyes of Charming
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These lenses allow the wearer to cast charm spells more effectively and influence others with their gaze.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Eyes of Minute Seeing
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These lenses allow the wearer to see fine details, revealing hidden messages or small objects.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Eyes of the Eagle
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These lenses enhance the wearer's vision, granting advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Feywild Shard
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This shard connects the user to the Feywild, allowing them to cast a unique spell once per day.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Figurine of Wondrous Power
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This figurine can transform into a creature when activated, serving as a loyal companion.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Finder's Goggles
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These goggles grant the wearer enhanced tracking abilities and the ability to locate objects.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These gauntlets set the wearer's Strength score to 19, granting them enhanced physical strength.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Gem of Brightness
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This gem can emit bright light to blind creatures and reveal hidden objects in the dark.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Glamerweave
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This enchanted fabric can change its appearance to resemble different types of clothing or armor.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Gloves of Missile Snaring
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These gloves allow the wearer to catch and deflect incoming projectiles, reducing damage from ranged attacks.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Gloves of Swimming and Climbing
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These gloves grant the wearer enhanced swimming and climbing abilities.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Gloves of Thievery
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These gloves provide a bonus to Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) and Dexterity (Lockpicking) checks.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Goggles of Night
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These goggles grant the wearer darkvision, allowing them to see in complete darkness.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Goggles of Object Reading
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These goggles allow the wearer to discern the history and magical properties of objects by examining them.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Guardian Emblem
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This emblem summons a guardian spirit to protect the bearer and their allies.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Guild Keyrune
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This key-like emblem represents membership in a specific guild and grants benefits within the guild.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Guild Signet Ring
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This signet ring bears the emblem of a particular guild and can be used to seal documents and show guild membership.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Harkon's Bite
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This magical trinket can heal the user and harm undead creatures when bitten.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Hat of Disguise
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This hat allows the wearer to change their appearance at will, assuming different forms.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Headband of Intellect
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This headband sets the wearer's Intelligence score to 19, granting them enhanced mental abilities.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Hellfire Weapon
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This weapon is imbued with hellfire, dealing additional fire damage and causing creatures to ignite when struck.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Helm of Comprehending Languages
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This helm allows the wearer to understand and speak any language they hear.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Helm of Telepathy
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This helm allows the wearer to communicate telepathically with others and read their surface thoughts.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Helm of Underwater Action
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This helm grants the wearer the ability to breathe underwater and move freely in aquatic environments.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Immovable Rod
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This rod can become magically fixed in place, holding significant weight and preventing movement.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Infernal Puzzle Box
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This intricate puzzle box may contain secrets, spells, or dangerous entities from the infernal planes.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Insignia of Claws
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This emblem provides a natural weapon, such as claws, to the wearer, which can be used for unarmed strikes.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Instrument of the Bards
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This magical instrument enhances the user's musical abilities and can cast spells when played.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Javelin of Lightning
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This javelin can be thrown to create a bolt of lightning that damages creatures in its path.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Keoghtom's Ointment
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This ointment can be used to heal wounds, neutralize poisons, and provide various protective effects.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Lantern of Revealing
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This lantern reveals hidden and invisible creatures and objects within its light.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Living Gloves
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These gloves are made from living material and can heal the wearer's wounds over time.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Lorehold Primer
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This primer contains knowledge of history and can grant expertise in certain subjects.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Mariner's Armor
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This armor is designed for underwater use, providing the wearer with a swim speed and the ability to breathe underwater.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Mask of the Beast
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This mask allows the wearer to assume the form of a specific animal and gain its abilities.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Medallion of Thoughts
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This medallion grants the wearer the ability to detect surface thoughts and communicate telepathically.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Mind Carapace Armor
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This armor is crafted from the carapace of an aberrant creature, granting resistance to psychic damage.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Mithral Armor
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This lightweight yet durable armor is made from mithral, offering both protection and mobility.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Mizzium Apparatus
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This device allows the user to cast spells from scrolls without consuming the scroll.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Moon Sickle
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This weapon is imbued with the power of the moon, dealing extra damage and granting the ability to cast spells.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Mummy Rot Antidote
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This potion can cure the debilitating effects of mummy rot, a curse inflicted by mummies.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Nature's Mantle
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This mantle provides resistance to cold, fire, and lightning damage, and can summon a protective barrier.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Necklace of Adaptation
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This necklace allows the wearer to breathe normally in any environment and resist harmful gases.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Night Caller
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This magical instrument can produce hauntingly beautiful music that influences dreams and sleep.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Oil of Slipperiness
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This oil makes the user extremely slippery and difficult to grapple or restrain.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Paper Bird
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This paper bird can carry written messages to a specified recipient, returning afterward.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Pearl of Power
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This pearl allows the attuned user to regain expended spell slots once per day.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Periapt of Health
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This amulet grants immunity to disease and prevents the wearer from becoming poisoned.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Periapt of Wound Closure
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This amulet accelerates the wearer's natural healing abilities, stabilizing them when unconscious.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Philter of Love
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This potion can make a creature fall deeply in love with the person who administers it.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Pipes of Haunting
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These pipes can create eerie music that frightens and disturbs those who hear it.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Pipes of the Sewers
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These pipes can summon a swarm of rats or control existing vermin in the area.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Piwafwi
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This magical cloak can create a protective field and conceal the wearer in shadows.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Pixie Dust
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This shimmering dust allows the user to cast the fly spell for a limited duration.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Potion of Advantage
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This potion grants advantage on the next ability check, attack roll, or saving throw made by the drinker.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Potion of Animal Friendship
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This potion can be used to befriend and charm animals for a limited duration.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Potion of Fire Breath
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This potion allows the drinker to exhale a cone of fire, damaging creatures in its path.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Potion of Giant Strength
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This potion temporarily increases the drinker's Strength score to a very high level.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Potion of Growth
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This potion causes the drinker to grow in size, increasing their strength and reach.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Potion of Healing
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This potion can be consumed to restore a moderate amount of hit points to the user.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Potion of Poison
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This potion is highly toxic and can be used to poison weapons or create deadly traps.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Potion of Resistance
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This potion grants resistance to a specific type of damage for a limited duration.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Potion of Water Breathing
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This potion allows the drinker to breathe underwater for a limited time.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Prismari Primer
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This primer contains knowledge of elemental magic and can enhance the user's spells.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Psi Crystal
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This crystal can enhance the user's psionic abilities and grant them psionic focus.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Pyroconverger
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This device can project a cone of flames, dealing fire damage to creatures in its path.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Quandrix Primer
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This primer contains knowledge of mathematical magic and can enhance the user's spells.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Quiver of Ehlonna
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This quiver can hold an endless supply of arrows or bolts and retrieve any ammunition used.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Rhythm Maker's Drum
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This magical drum can produce rhythms that enhance the abilities of those who listen to it.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Ring of Jumping
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This ring grants the wearer incredible jumping ability, allowing them to leap great distances.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Ring of Mind Shielding
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This ring protects the wearer's mind from intrusion and allows them to hide their alignment.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Ring of Obscuring
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This ring can create a magical veil of darkness, obscuring the wearer's location and making them difficult to detect.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Ring of Swimming
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This ring grants the wearer the ability to swim through water with ease and breathe underwater.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Ring of Truth Telling
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This ring compels the wearer to speak the truth and grants the ability to discern lies.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Ring of Warmth
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This ring protects the wearer from extreme cold and grants resistance to cold damage.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Ring of Water Walking
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This ring allows the wearer to walk on the surface of water as if it were solid ground.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Rings of Shared Suffering
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These paired rings allow wearers to share damage taken in combat, reducing harm to each other.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Robe of Serpents
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This robe is adorned with serpentine motifs and can summon snakes to aid the wearer.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Robe of Useful Items
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This robe is covered in patches that can be torn off and activated to produce various useful items.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Rod of Retribution
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This rod can store harmful spells cast at the user and release them as a powerful counterattack.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Rod of the Pact Keeper, +1
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This rod enhances a warlock's spellcasting abilities, increasing their spell attack bonus and spell save DC.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Rope of Climbing
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This rope can move on its own and help the user climb, lowering and raising itself as needed.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Saddle of the Cavalier
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This saddle provides advantage on riding checks and can magically stabilize the rider.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Scaled Ornament
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This ornament provides a bonus to Armor Class and can be transformed into a suit of scale mail.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Seeker Dart
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This dart can magically locate its target and change direction to strike it.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Sending Stones
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These paired stones allow communication between the users, regardless of distance, as long as they are on the same plane of existence.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Sentinel Shield
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This shield provides advantage on initiative rolls and grants the wearer a limited form of precognition.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Serpent Scale Armor
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This armor is made from the scales of serpents and provides resistance to poison damage.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Shatterspike
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This weapon can shatter other weapons and shields, rendering them useless.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Shield, +1
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This magical shield provides a +1 bonus to the user's Armor Class.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Silverquill Primer
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This primer contains knowledge of language and rhetoric and can enhance the user's spells.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Skyblinder Staff
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This staff can cast blindness spells and create a magical barrier of darkness.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Slippers of Spider Climbing
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These slippers allow the wearer to climb walls and ceilings like a spider.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Smokepowder
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This alchemical powder can explode when ignited, dealing fire damage to creatures in its radius.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Soul Coin
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This coin contains the soul of a creature and can be used to barter with extraplanar beings.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Spell Gem
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This gem can store a spell and be used to cast it later, even if the user is not a spellcaster.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Spell Scroll
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This scroll contains a single spell that can be cast by anyone who reads it, but the scroll is consumed in the process.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Spellwrought Tattoo
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This magical tattoo can store and cast a spell, which can be triggered by the wearer.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Spies' Murmur
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This amulet can be used to send and receive whispered messages, even across great distances.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Staff of the Adder
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This staff can summon venomous snakes to attack enemies and has a venomous bite.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Staff of the Python
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This staff can transform into a giant constrictor snake, obeying the commands of the wielder.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Stone of Good Luck (Luckstone)
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This stone grants the attuned user good luck, providing a +1 bonus to ability checks and saving throws.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Stone of Ill Luck
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This cursed stone brings misfortune to its attuned user, imposing a -1 penalty to ability checks and saving throws.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Storm Boomerang
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This boomerang can create a storm of lightning when thrown, damaging creatures in its path.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Sword of Vengeance
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This cursed sword seeks vengeance and grants the attuned user the ability to curse foes.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Thessaltoxin Antidote
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This potion can cure the effects of thessaltoxin, a poison that weakens the victim.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Trident of Fish Command
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This trident can control and command aquatic creatures when wielded by its attuned user.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Wand of Entangle
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This wand can cast the entangle spell, ensnaring creatures in vines and plants.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Wand of Magic Detection
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This wand can detect the presence of magic and reveal invisible creatures and magical auras.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Wand of Magic Missiles
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This wand can cast the magic missile spell, launching bolts of force at targets.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Wand of Secrets
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This wand can reveal hidden doors and traps, making it a valuable tool for exploration.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Wand of the War Mage
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This wand enhances a spellcaster's spell attacks, increasing their spell attack bonus.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Wand of Web
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This wand can cast the web spell, creating sticky webs to ensnare creatures.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Weapon, +1
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This magical weapon provides a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Weapon of Warning
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This weapon grants the attuned user an alertness to danger, preventing surprise attacks.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Wheel of Wind and Water
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This wheel can control the wind and water, granting the user control over weather and water currents.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Wildspace Orrery
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This orrery is a celestial map of the cosmos, allowing the user to navigate the vastness of wildspace.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Wind Fan
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This fan can summon powerful winds, allowing the user to control the weather and create gusts of wind.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Winged Boots
UncommonMagicItems.Description: These boots grant the wearer the ability to fly for a limited time each day.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Wingwear
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This magical garment allows the wearer to glide through the air like a bird.

UncommonMagicItems.Name: Witherbloom Primer
UncommonMagicItems.Description: This primer contains knowledge of necromantic magic and can enhance the user's spells.
